statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE tokens > 100;
SELECT customer_id, tokens FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, tokens FROM loyalty_points ORDER BY tokens DESC;
SELECT customer_id, tokens FROM loyalty_points WHERE tokens BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, tokens FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id = 1 AND tokens > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(tokens) AS total_tokens FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_tokens DESC;
SELECT customer_id, tokens FROM loyalty_points WHERE tokens BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY tokens DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(tokens) AS average_tokens FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(tokens) > 75;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM loyalty_points WHERE tokens < 50;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT points, customer_id FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_points WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id FROM tokens WHERE customer_id > 500;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 500;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(token_id) AS token_count FROM tokens GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY token_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT lp.customer_id, lp.points, t.customer_id FROM loyalty_points lp INNER JOIN tokens t ON lp.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(points) AS max_points FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_points > 200;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT token_value, customer_id FROM tokens WHERE token_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT t.token_value, c.customer_name, tr.transaction_date FROM tokens t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN transactions tr ON t.token_id = tr.token_id;
SELECT tr.transaction_id, c.customer_name, tr.transaction_amount FROM transactions tr JOIN customers c ON tr.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE tr.transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, SUM(tr.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN transactions tr ON c.customer_id = tr.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
SELECT program_name, expiration_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, token_amount FROM customer_tokens WHERE token_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith'
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_tokens INNER JOIN loyalty_program ON customer_tokens.program_id = loyalty_program.program_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_table;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_table WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM token_table ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_table GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT reward_name, reward_cost FROM reward_table WHERE reward_cost < 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_table WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_table WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, loyalty_points FROM customer_table WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, token_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_table WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM redemption_table WHERE customer_id = 3 AND redemption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
